Help the little elf to find eleven

potions needed to freeze the lava

and escape alive.

Game written for NOMAM's

BASIC 10-liners Contest 2023.

Requires:

- Atari XL/XE (or emulator)

- Atari builtin BASIC ROM

- A set of paddle controllers

Game instructions:

- An elf is trapped in lava.

- There is a potion in a corner.

- Guide the little elf to the

  potion using both paddles.

- One paddle moves the elf

  vertically and the other moves

  horizontally.

- The elf walks slower than the

  given instructions, so be

  careful and avoid guiding him

  directly to lava.

- Each time the elf gets a potion,

  another one will appear in

  another corner.

- The elf needs to get the potion

  within a given amount of time.

- Get enough potions to freeze

  lava and escape.

- When time runs out or when the

  elf hits the lava, all starts

  again.
